WorkItem.Description:
Rawr crashes when I try to open a saved character file.
 
Steps to reproduce:
1) Start Rawr
2) Click File > Open
 
Addtional Information:
== Error Message ==
[FileDialog_UserInitiated]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.51204.0&File=System.Windows.dll&Key=FileDialog_UserInitiated
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.Windows.Controls.OpenFileDialog.ShowDialog()
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.OpenCharacter(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs args)
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(MouseButtonEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(Control ctrl, EventArgs e)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, Int32 actualArgsTypeIndex, String eventName)

Comments.Message: And you haven't bothered to attach the saved file because???

1) Please attach the character file that is failing
2) What version of Rawr are you using? The latest is 4.0.15 and shouldn't be having this problem
